name: Sheep Balls by HaidrGna and Chaos.blend
name_original: Sheep Balls by HaidrGna and Chaos.blend
description: The reclusive Sheep like their solitude in Sillygoat Valley but the Goats have broken their confinement and are now detached from their pens. Help Balls isolate the Goats from the Sheep and bring them back to the barn so the Shepard can exile them once and for all. The more Goats you segregate the more privacy the Sheep will have. The faster Balls completes his task the more points you earn.
